divs: Sighting Details I live very close to logan airport in boston, Ma I was looking out my window saw an object.It was orbed shaped.I have a view of alot of towns around me. I like to sit outside on my baconly and watch the plane come and go. It seemed odd and nothing I ever seen before. I have seen planes come and go for 5 years.It traveled from south to north faster than a plane. straight up. It then went from east to west faster than any plane ever I saw. It was like a half colored on one side...left...gold..and clear on the other side,right... but you can still tell it was an orb. I lost sight of it when it passed my building.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Medford
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: sphere out my 5th story building over looking Boston
